Harper Reed: Technology and death metal

Hacking, Baphomet and the real time internet
Hi. My name is Harper. I am an engineer excited about real time, social software and the open source software movement. I am lucky enough to have worked for: Obama for America, Rackspace and Threadless. Check out my homepage and follow me on twitter.
